### Tender Description

The Government of Canada's Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified Design-Build (D-B) bidders to deliver a Storage Garage located in Pond Inlet, Nunavut for Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC). The project is subject to the Agreement Between the Inuit of the Nunavut Settlement Area and His Majesty the King in Right of Canada. In accordance with section 9.35.35 Notification of Procurement, this is to provide notification of the subject solicitation.

A Design-Build (D-B) firm must be registered on the Inuit Firm Registry (IFR) and
